fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Connection: You are randomly assigned a non-King, non-Cultist target at the beginning of the game. 
- Reconnect: You may choose one new target up until Day 3. [Deactivates D3]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Protection: Discard 2 cards. Guard! an attack on your target. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Healing Tears: Heal! a player. [3 uses, 1 CD, Astral]
- Soulguard: If your target dies from non-event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Your target must survive to see the end of the game, or win within 2 phases of their death.
